entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:05 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 6:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.4°C
Wind: S 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending early this evening then cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late in the evening then 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
